Content.Text:
<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mr. Nadi! Mr. Nadi! I wanna hear the rest of that
story about your travels! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>What, again?
<PAGE>
<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! You tell the best stories! But if you don't
wanna do that, then let's play hide-and-seek
instead.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Hmm...?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! <MYNAME>! What's up?
I want in, too!
You really like kids, huh?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yeah! Let's all three of us play together! ♪

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
We can, right? You don't mind, do you, Mr.
Nadi?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Whatever.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yay! ♪

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
See, the King of that country loved animals. So
after completing all his requests, the place came
out looking like a zoo.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>Really?! His yard looked like a zoo?! Wow! I
wish I could've seen that!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>I've got a photo of it. I'll dig it out sometime.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>You will? Yaaay! I can't wait to see it!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ei--ght...ni---ne...TEN!! Ready or not, here I
come!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>We're ready.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Aha! I found you, Mr. Nadi! ♪

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, where's <MYNAME>? Hmmm... Maybe
over here?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmmm. Not there. So...where? Over this way,
maybe?

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_L>...Really? Don't you have any better places to
hide? For a second, I was afraid you'd just
collapsed.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee hee! That was lots of fun.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Uh-oh. It's time for me to go help with chores.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Thanks for playing with me, Mr. Nadi! And
<MYNAME>, too! We should do this again!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? I didn't have anything better to do, so I
entertained her.
<PAGE>
It's not that I have a soft spot for kids or
anything. Anyway, I'm going back to my room.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
See, I always think she looks bored. The only
other kid her age -- Lutz, I think? -- is always
busy studying. He can't come play much.
<PAGE>
If you've got some spare time, you should come
by and play with her a little, too.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Later.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
Not really. She gets bored a lot, so she comes to
pester me.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>'s here now, so why don't you
two play? I'm going back to my room.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Awww, Mr. Nadi! It'd be way more fun if all
three of us could play together!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
No, he's not mad. He's just shy. You wouldn't
think it, but he's a delicate person.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? How do I know?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Hee hee! Because he and I play together a lot.
<PAGE>
We've played together so much now that I can
just kinda tell.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'm sure if you talked to Mr. Nadi a whole,
whole, whooole lot...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...then you'd start to understand what kind of
person he is, too! ♪

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Anyway! What should we play?
<PAGE>
Oooh, I know! Since we're both girls, we could
play house, or play with my dolls!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Hee hee! That'll be so much fun! Let's both play
enough to make up Mr. Nadi's part, too!
